sense.def:
V stavbi ali predmetu je
space
območje, ki je prazno ali na voljo za uporabo.

seg.quote: There was just enough space for a bed.
...the luggage space at the back of the car.

sense.def:
Space
je tudi območje onkraj zemeljskega ozračja.

seg.quote: ...the first human being to travel in space.

sense.def:
A space
je odprtina ali prazen prostor.

seg.quote: The door had spaces at the top and bottom.
We spent half an hour looking for a parking space.

sense.def:
A space of time
je določeno časovno obdobje.

seg.quote: It happened three times in the space of five months.
He should arrive in a very short space of time.

sense.def:
To space a series of things
ali
to space them out
pomeni razporediti niz stvari tako, da so med njimi presledki.

seg.quote: The lines were spaced well apart.
These books should have large print well spaced out on the page.
